title: Did Nancy Belusi say that Obama's care should go to "knowing what's in it "?
subtitle: A much-repeated quote from the former Speaker of the House of Representatives on the adoption of the Affordable Care Act is usually offered outside the context.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Nancy Belusi, the minority leader at home, said about the Affordable Care Act, in 2010: "We must succeed in the bill so that you can find out what it is."
